description: Although this was their first collaboration, Stott and Qin played like long-time friends. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Concert review: Pianist Kathryn Stott bows out with dazzling recital with cellist Qin Li-wei
title_page: Concert review: Pianist Kathryn Stott bows out with dazzling recital with cellist Qin Li-wei | The Straits Times
maintext:
Cello & Piano Duo Recital: Qin Li-wei and Kathryn Stott
Victoria Concert Hall
Aug 31, 8.15pm
British pianist Kathryn Stott opened the inaugural Singapore International Piano Festival 30 years ago with its first piano recital at Victoria Concert Hall. After a storied performing career of 45 years, she has called time on playing in public. This recital in partnership with Australian Chinese cellist Qin Li-wei, in the very same venue, was part of her farewell tour.
